    • Description

    Experience a jitter-free and colour-enriched visual experience with the Sony TV which is designed to take your entertainment to an elevated level. This TV is driven by the X1 processor which helps in reducing the noise and boosts the visual quality. Furthermore, the impressive 4K X-Reality PRO of this TV amplifies the visuals and enables you to appreciate up to 4K picture clarity. Additionally, with Motionflow XR 100 sported in this TV, there is no stopping for your entertainment, and you can flawlessly enjoy stutter-free visuals no matter how graphically rich the content is.

    Read More
    Product Description
    Powerful Processor

    Powered by the X1 processor, featuring innovative algorithms that help reduce noise and enhance the resolution, this Sony TV enables you to experience a visual delight. Furthermore, owing to its enhanced 4K signal, any content you stream comes out with vibrant colours.

    Unmatched Entertainment

    You can seamlessly enjoy around 700000+ movies and TV shows kept in a single quiver to keep you entertained at all times. Moreover, these movies and shows are organised into themes and genres depending on your taste which tickles your entertainment rib and keeps you amused constantly.

    Google Assistant

    With this TV under your possession, you can conveniently ask Google to explore for data across all applications and platforms. Everything from adventurous treks to your favourite superhero movies is flawlessly obtainable that takes your entertainment quotient to elevated heights.

    Mesmerising Visuals

    Thanks to the 4K processor X1 equipped with this TV, you can enjoy stunning 4K images that are rich in detail and sharpness. Additionally, the innovative 4K X-Reality PRO makes use of a 4K database to upscale images shot in 2K and Full HD, enabling you to enjoy up to 4K resolution.

    Motionflow XR 100

    With Motionflow XR 100 boasted by this TV, you can appreciate flawless and concise visuals even in fast-moving sequences and intense gaming. Furthermore, extra frames are created and inserted between the original ones to determine the split second of missing action in the sequences by comparing important visual characteristics on successive frames. Additionally, this TV offers black-frame insertion for an enhanced theatrical effect.

    Colour-rich Amusement

    The enthralling capability of this TV broadens the image's colours to effectively replicate the hues, resulting in beautiful colour reproduction, enabling a dapper visual experience.

    Enhanced Audio

    Dolby Audio incorporated in this TV produces a sound that is rich, clear, and authentic. This way, you can enjoy your favourite song appreciating each note and layer of the music.

    Smart User Experience

    This Sony TV employs an effective computer model that analyses and compensates for speaker response imperfections by precisely sampling the speaker frequency which cancels out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response, resulting in clean, natural music with smooth, even frequency reproduction.

    Convenient Operation

    You can conveniently ask your TV to connect and engage with your smart devices, such as security cameras and appliances, using Google Assistant. This offers an effortless and delightful user experience.

    Handy Google Home

    Thanks to the Google Home adapted in this Sony TV that enables you to operate it without lifting a finger. Furthermore, you can use Google Home to discover and cast your favourite videos on your Sony TV.

    Chromecast Supremacy

    The Chromecast feature enabled in this TV allows you to cast your favourite films, games, and apps from your mobile device to your TV. This allows you to enhance the things you love with a single push of the Cast button on your Android or iOS screen. Moreover, you can continue surfing on your phone or tablet after casting your content on the TV.

    Entertainment Reloaded

    This TV comes with Google Play which allows you to enjoy numerous movies, TV series, games, and much more to enhance your entertainment and stay on par with the world.

    Seamless Connectivity

    You can seamlessly connect your Bluetooth headsets or earbuds with this TV and enjoy your favourite TV shows and music without interruptions wherever you go and appreciate a hands-free operation.

    Enhanced Protection

    X- Protection Pro incorporated in this TV protects your television in four ways. To begin with, without ventilation holes, hazardous dust is kept out. Second, the main capacitor keeps your TV steady even during electrical power spikes. Furthermore, a moisture-resistant coating on the wire eliminates short circuits produced by excessive moisture. Finally, a lightning protector protects your TV from lightning strikes of up to 9000 volts.

    Sit Back and Enjoy

    With a dedicated Netflix button on Sony TV remote, you can start streaming your favourite content whenever you feel like having a good time.
